original_text: They travelled across the whole island and they arrived at a town called Paphos. There they met a man called Bar-Jesus. He was a Jew. He used magic to do surprising things. He said that he was a prophet from God. But his messages were not true.
korean_text: 온 섬 가운데로 지나서 바보에 이르러 바예수라 하는 유대인 거짓 선지자인 마술사를 만나니

sentences.original_text: They travelled across the whole island
and they arrived at a town called Paphos.
There they met a man called Bar-Jesus.
He used magic to do surprising things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 놀라운 일을 하기 위해 마법을 사용했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He said that he was a prophet from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 하나님으로부터 온 예언자라고 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But his messages were not true.
